document.heading: Election Recount and Judicial Review Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-168, the “Election Recount and Judicial Review Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-269, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 2002, and April 9, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 30, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-357 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-168 became effective on June 28, 2002.
